trans-unit.source: Contains information about a single instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" />.
trans-unit.target: 含有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> 之單一執行個體的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> class is the high-level class for the declaration of a binding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>類別是繫結的宣告的高層級的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> class is the underlying object that maintains the connection between the binding source and the binding target.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>類別為基礎的物件會維護繫結來源與繫結目標之間的連線。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> contains all the information that can be shared across several <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>包含可以跨數個共用的所有資訊<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>物件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> is an instance expression that cannot be shared and that contains all the instance information about the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>無法共用，並包含所有執行個體資訊相關的執行個體運算式<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider the following, where `myDataObject` is an instance of the `MyData` class, `myBinding` is the source <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> object, and `MyData` class is a defined class that contains a string property named `MyDataProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，請考慮下列項目，其中`myDataObject`的執行個體`MyData`類別`myBinding`來源<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>物件，和`MyData`類別是包含名為字串屬性的定義的類別`MyDataProperty`。

trans-unit.source: This example binds the text content of `mytext`, which is an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, to `MyDataProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 此範例中會繫結內容的文字`mytext`，這是執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>至`MyDataProperty`。

trans-unit.source: You can use the same `myBinding` object to create other bindings.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用相同`myBinding`物件以建立其他的繫結。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might use the `myBinding` object to bind the text content of a check box to `MyDataProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會使用`myBinding`要繫結文字內容的核取方塊，以物件`MyDataProperty`。

trans-unit.source: In that scenario, there will be two instances of <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> that share the `myBinding` object.
trans-unit.target: 在這種情況下，會有兩個執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>共用`myBinding`物件。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object by using the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A> method or the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetBindingExpression%2A> method on a data-bound object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以取得<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>物件使用<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A>方法或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetBindingExpression%2A>資料繫結物件上的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding source object that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> uses.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> 所使用的繫結來源物件。

trans-unit.source: The binding source object that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> uses.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> 所使用的繫結來源物件。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the implementation of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event handler that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A> method to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> and then calls the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.DataItem%2A> property to access the binding source object.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>用事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingOperations.GetBindingExpression%2A>方法，以取得<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>，然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.DataItem%2A>屬性來存取繫結來源物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> `SavingsText` is the binding target object, and its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.Text%2A> property is the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> `SavingsText`是繫結目標物件，並將其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock.Text%2A>屬性是繫結目標屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> object of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> object of the current binding expression.
trans-unit.target: 目前繫結運算式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.Binding" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding source object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> 的繫結來源物件。

trans-unit.source: The binding source object for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> 的繫結來源物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the binding source property for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> 的繫結來源屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the binding source property for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression" /> 的繫結來源屬性的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.WeakEventManager" /> 型別。

trans-unit.source: This only recognizes manager objects of type <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 這只會辨識屬於 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.CollectionChangedEventManager" /> 型別的管理員物件。

trans-unit.source: Object that originated the event.
trans-unit.target: 發出事件的物件。

trans-unit.source: Event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員支援 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基礎結構，但是您不可以從程式碼直接使用它。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the listener handled the event; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果由接聽程式處理事件，就是 <see langword="true" />，否則就是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends the current binding target value to the binding source property in <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWayToSource" /> bindings.
trans-unit.target: 將目前的繫結目標值傳送至 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWayToSource" /> 繫結的繫結來源屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing when the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A> of the binding is not <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay> or <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWayToSource>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會執行任何動作時<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.Mode%2A>繫結的不<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.TwoWay>或<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingMode.OneWayToSource>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A> value of your binding is set to <xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.Explicit>, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A> method or the changes will not propagate back to the source.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.UpdateSourceTrigger%2A>繫結的值設定為<xref:System.Windows.Data.UpdateSourceTrigger.Explicit>，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression.UpdateSource%2A>方法或所做的變更將不會傳播到來源。

trans-unit.source: The binding has been detached from its target.
trans-unit.target: 繫結已與目標中斷連結。

trans-unit.source: Forces a data transfer from the binding source property to the binding target property.
trans-unit.target: 強制執行從繫結來源屬性至繫結目標屬性的資料傳輸。

trans-unit.source: This method enables you to force a data transfer from the source property to the target property.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您強制從 source 屬性的資料傳輸至目標屬性。

trans-unit.source: If your source object implements a proper property-changed notification mechanism such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>, target updates happen automatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的來源物件會實作適當的屬性變更通知機制，例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>，目標更新會自動發生。

trans-unit.source: However, you have the option to use this method to update the target property explicitly in cases where your source object does not provide the proper property-changed notifications.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您必須使用這個方法來更新目標屬性明確地在您的來源物件不提供適當的屬性變更通知的情況下的選項。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this method if your application needs to update the target properties periodically.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的應用程式需要定期更新目標內容，您也可以使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The binding has been detached from its target.
trans-unit.target: 繫結已與目標中斷連結。
